value.name: Jones letter: Yantis killing
value.description: I am outraged by the determination of our attorney general, Lawrence Wasden, to drop any consideration of charges to be filed in the killing of rancher Jack Yantis. It is pretty clear that both ...

value.name: Yantis letter-writers sound off on ruling
value.description: Idaho — the Police State. This should be the new state moniker. Gov. Butch Otter should fire Lawrence Wasden and appoint a special prosecutor to hold the shooters of Jack Yantis accountable.

value.name: Nampans seek change to open-range law after bull crash
value.description: It was not until after she was released from the hospital a month later that Dori Garner heard the full story about the tragic aftermath of the crash: The bull's owner, Jack Yantis, had been shot ...

value.name: Sheriff releases names of Idaho deputies who killed rancher
value.description: The deputies shot Jack Yantis, 62, after an altercation Nov ... Nampa lawyer Kevin Dinius told the newspaper. Idaho State Police are investigating and have declined to comment on what led up ...
